title: Pathian Hmangaihna
lyrics:
Ka chhut nawn fo thin Pathian hmangaihna hi,
Zing, chhun, zan, englai pawn a hnai reng;
Ka chakloh ber lai pawn min ensan lo,
Min hmangaih, min thlahthlam ve ngai lo.

A chuai ve lo, a thar zel thin,
A chul thei lo Pathian hmangaihna thu hi;
Min hruaina chanchin ngaihnawm hi ziak dawn ila,
Ka hun leh theihna te hian a tlin lovang.

Hmangaihna sang ber Pathian hmangaihna chuan,
Lal Isua fa mal neihchhun min pe;
Midang tan ka thiltih tlem zia chhut hian,
Ka hmangaih nep zia ka hmuchiang thin.

Ka damchhung zawng hian ka theihna tlem tal in,
Lalpa chu fak mai tur ka lo ni;
Misual kei rawngbawltuah min thlang hi,
A hmangaih ropui zia ti chiangtu.
